issue.title: [C++] Check EINTR in file IO
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16303](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16303). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Just to be safe. AFAIK local file IO is non-interruptible and never returns EINTR. But NFS may return EINTR.
